content:
Only four of the planned 12 bills have passed so far

IN BRITAIN, a mass of data about Parliament’s performance is in this week’s first annual Parliamentary Monitor from the Institute for Government (IfG), a think-tank. The most striking relate to the government’s planned 12 Brexit bills. So far only four have passed, including the EU withdrawal act, which took 273 hours of debate. Although Brexit is due next March, sensitive bills on agriculture, fisheries and migration have not even been introduced. The IfG report blames slow progress on cabinet disputes and on the government’s lack of a clear majority in either chamber. 

Brexit also requires some 800 new statutory instruments. The report says the scrutiny of this secondary legislation is unsatisfactory. Even when an instrument is considered by a special committee, the average time that it is given is just 18 minutes. One in eight of all inquiries by Parliamentary select committees are also now Brexit-related. And all this is before Parliament gets a “meaningful” vote on any Brexit deal, which may be even harder to win.

ex: n. 议会；国会；英国议会（包括下议院和上议院）；一届议会的会期
网络 百乐门；国会大厦；议会大厦
eg2: The German parliament is called the ‘Bundestag’.
德国的议会称为 Bundestag。
a Member of Parliament
议会议员
The issue was debated in Parliament .
议会就这个问题进行了辩论。
an Act of Parliament
议会法案
to win a seat in Parliament
赢得议会中的一个席位
to be elected to Parliament
当选为议会议员
We are now into the second half of the parliament.
我们现已进入了本届议会的后半任期。
to dissolve Parliament(= formally end its activities) and call an election
解散议会并举行大选

ex: adj. 议会的；国会的；议会制度的

wp.Parliamentary Sovereignty: 议会至上;议会主权;议会主权制;议会主权原则

eg2: That party lost 15 seats in the Parliamentary election.
该党在议会选举中失去了15席。
With his hard line, Mr Sarkozy seems to be behind a ban, although he will now await the outcome of the  mission.
持强硬路线的萨科奇先生似乎似乎不久后就会签署这一禁令，尽管目前他仍在等候议会的结果。
"We must persevere in this war as people, as a government, as a Parliamentary group in order for the country to win it," Papandreou said.
帕潘德里欧说：“在这场战争中，我们必须要作为一个人、一个政府及国会团体坚贞不屈，让我们的国家能赢得战争。

ex: v. 碾碎；磨碎；把…磨成粉；磨（粉）
n. 令人疲劳（或厌倦）的工作；苦差事；刺耳的摩擦声
网络 研磨；折磨；磨快
eg2: to grind coffee/corn
将咖啡╱谷粒磨成粉
The flour is ground using traditional methods.
这面粉是用传统方法磨制而成。
a special stone for grinding knives
专门磨刀用的石头
He ground his cigarette into the ashtray.
他把香烟按在烟灰缸里捻灭。
The dirt on her hands was ground in.
她手上的泥渍住了。
Parts of the machine were grinding together noisily.
机器零件摩擦发出刺耳的声音。
She grinds her teeth when she is asleep.
她睡觉时磨牙。
He ground the gears on the car.
他把汽车排挡弄得嘎嘎作响。
to grind a pepper mill
摇动胡椒磨

罢工期间生产渐渐陷入瘫痪。

而这是由我们的立法环境所决定的。

ex: n. 详细审查；监视；细看；选票复查

假设是都要拿出来给读者进行仔细审查和批评性的评估的，而且其正好表明他们是不能控制结论的。
Some of us have trouble with accountability because we associate the word with punishment, , and/or not meeting standards or agreements.
好些人都把责任理解错误了，因为我们总是把责任和惩罚，仔细检查或者没有达到标准或不一致性联系在一起。

这架仪器很灵敏。

我们最好避开这个敏感的话题。
Try your best to sidestep for  issues like this.
你应尽可能地回避像这类敏感的问题。

eg2: The education secretary had set out statutory guidelines for schools and councils to follow, he added, which would ensure that "inappropriate" content would not be used.
教育部长已经为学校和委员会设立了应该遵循的法定方针，他补充说，这可以确保不合适的内容不会被使用。

wp.Viper Strike: 蝮蛇突袭;蝰蛇打击;毒蛇出击;蛇打击

ex: vi. 打，打击；罢工；敲，敲击；抓；打动；穿透
vt. 打，击；罢工；撞击，冲击；侵袭；打动；到达
n. 罢工；打击；殴打
n. (Strike)人名；(英)斯特赖克
eg2: They blacklegged in the last .
在上次罢工中他们当了工贼。
The docker's  tied up the port.
码头工人的罢工使港口陷于瘫痪。
All these circumstances looked to a great .
所有这些情况可能会导致一场大罢工。

transform: struck 或 strook,struck 或 stricken,striking

ex: adj. 不令人满意的；不满足的；不符合要求的

wp.Unsatisfactory progress: 布任政府的电子政府建设

eg2: How do you think a manager should react to an employee’s  work?
你认为一个经理对一个员工不合要求的工作应该做出怎么的反应。
I aspired to them partly because I was ambitious and partly because I now saw my hobby as an  thing if it went no further.
我向往他们是因为我雄心勃勃，因为我现在发现自己的嗜好如果不能更进一步就不能令人满意。
Of course, there are still unsatisfactory conditions; there are still situations that can be improved.
当然，依然存在诸多令人不满意的状况；还有一些能够加以改善的情况。

wp.withdrawal sleeve: 退卸套;退卸衬套;分离套筒
wp.strategic withdrawal: 战略撤退;战略转移;计谋撤退

ex: n. 撤退，收回；提款；取消；退股
eg2: Atomicity requires that both  and deposit should happen in one go, or neither must occur.
原子性要求提款和存款必须同时发生，或者二者都不发生。
While China does not welcome the U.S. presence near its border, it wants stability on its western flank and believes an abrupt withdrawal of Washington's support for Pakistan could imperil that.
尽管中国不欢迎美国势力出现在其边境附近，但中国希望有个稳定的西部，并认为华府突然收回对巴基斯坦的支持可能危及其边境稳定。
Dreams about smoking were the result of tobacco , as 97% of subjects did not have them while smoking, and their occurrence was significantly related to the duration of abstinence.
与吸烟有关的梦是香烟被收回引起的，约97%的病例在吸烟时不会做那样的梦，这些梦的出现与禁烟的持续有极大关系。

Title: Most Brexit bills are caught up in a slow legislative grind

paperStatistics.title: Most Brexit bills are caught up in a slow legislative grind
paperStatistics.desc: Only four of the planned 12 bills have passed so far
